original_text: but I did not believe the reports until I came and my own eyes had seen it. And behold, half the greatness of your wisdom was not told me; you surpass the report that I heard.
korean_text: 내가 그 말들을 믿지 아니하였더니 이제 와서 본즉 당신의 지혜가 크다 한 말이 그 절반도 못 되니 당신은 내가 들은 소문보다 더하도다

sentences.original_text: but I did not believe the reports
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나는 그 소문을 믿지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: and my own eyes had seen it.
half the greatness of your wisdom was not told me
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 지혜의 위대함은 절반도 내게 알려지지 않았습니다
